item.title: Video Editor for Gaming Channel - Upwork
item.description:
I am seeking a skilled video editor who can professionally edit videos for myc gaming channel. The ideal candidate should have a deep understanding of video editing techniques to enhance my gaming content's overall quality and engagement. Your primary responsibility will be to edit raw footage into captivating videos by incorporating visually appealing transitions, effects, and sound. Additionally, you will be crucial in optimizing video engagement by ensuring seamless storytelling and maintaining viewer interest throughout the video. If you have a passion for gaming and possess a strong creative eye, I would love to collaborate with you.

I also I would love it if you have previous work I can see if you have a Tiktok, youtube, or any videos you may have edited would be amazing
Skills required:
- Proficient in video editing
- Strong knowledge of gaming culture and trends
- Ability to create visually appealing and engaging videos
- Excellent storytelling and narrative skills


Posted On: June 26, 2024 22:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Gaming Video, Visual Effects, Video Transition, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Gaming Video, Visual Effects, Video Transition, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production

item.title: Experienced YouTube Video Editor Needed For An Entertaining & Ed. channel [100 Videos for $3000] - Upwork
item.description:
This is a LONG-TERM position with GREAT benefits such as Bonuses and raises based on quality work and performance!
You’re responsible for creating engaging 8–12-minute videos 1-2 times weekly.

Examples:
Below are links to my competitors' channels for you to refer to that will give you a better understanding of the level of quality we need from you.

1. https://www.youtube.com/@DavidFarmUS
2. https://www.youtube.com/@thesmartfarm
3. https://www.youtube.com/@hawkfarm
4. https://www.youtube.com/@FarmFront/videos
5. https://www.youtube.com/@MINDMACHINES-mu2yn/videos
6. https://www.youtube.com/@wearefarmersusa/videos
7: https://www.youtube.com/@FoodTheory

Requirements:
1. English expert
2. Professional software
3. 48H Or less turnaround time
4. Willing to work long term and grow with the team
5. Strong Editing Skills: Proficiency in cutting, sequencing, and enhancing video content to create a polished final product.
6. Creativity and Innovation: Ability to introduce creative elements and innovative techniques to make videos engaging and visually appealing.
7. Experience with Educational and Entertaining Content: Familiarity with editing content in a way that is both informative and entertaining.
8. Attention to Detail: Ensuring all edits are precise, with no errors or inconsistencies, and maintaining high quality throughout.
9. Knowledge of Visual Effects and Graphics: Skill in adding appropriate visual effects, transitions, and graphics to enhance the viewer's experience.
10. Collaboration Skills: Ability to work closely with the content creation team, incorporating feedback and aligning with the overall vision.
11. Sound Editing Skills: Proficiency in editing and enhancing audio to ensure clear, high-quality sound in the final videos.
12. Consistency in Branding: Ensuring all videos are consistent with the channel’s branding, using specific color schemes, fonts, and styles that match the overall aesthetic of the content.

(100 Videos For $3000)

Please provide samples of previous work to be considered for the position!


Posted On: June 26, 2024 21:56 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Promotional Video, Video Sales Letter, Explainer Video, Short Video Ad, Instagram Reels, YouTube Video, Documentary Video, Cinematic Video, Video Editing & Production, 2D Animation, 3D Animation, Animated Explainer, Real Estate, Video Ad

item.title: Experienced Vlog Editor for Motorcycle Vlogger - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced vlog editor to work with our motorcycle vlogger. As the vlog editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing raw footage to create engaging and professional vlogs. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of vlogging trends and be able to create visually appealing videos that capture the essence of motorcycle adventures. Post will be for TikTok, IG Reels, FB, YouTube, So there may be multiple different formats

    Skills required:
    - Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
    - Strong storytelling and narrative skills
    - Ability to implement creative editing techniques
    - Knowledge of color grading and audio mixing
    - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
    - Familiarity with the motorcycle industry is a plus



    This is a medium-sized project that is expected to last between 1 to 3 months, with the possibility of extension. We are looking for an intermediate-level editor who has prior experience editing vlogs or similar content.

    If you are a passionate editor with a love for motorcycles and creating compelling visual stories, we would love to hear from you. Please include links to your portfolio or relevant work samples in your application.

Hourly Range: $8.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 21:55 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Adobe Creative Cloud Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We're seeking a self motivated, creative, trusting and reliable video editor with the latest Adobe Creative Cloud subscription who regularly keeps their software up to date. Projects will vary however you will be provided all assets, and editing directions.

Candidates must be able to read and follow directions clearly. This is extremely important.  For some of the edits you will get a copy of a previous Adobe project to be able to copy and paste the editing elements and details.  Although following directions is key we do want to foster creativity and love team members who provide constructive feedback.

It's extremely important that only candidates with the latest Adobe Creative Cloud subscription apply because we will share project files back and forth with each other and need to be able to communicate.  When you submit a project you'll have to submit all assets as well as the project files so if there are small re-edits we can take care of it on our end.

Reliability and communication are two of our core values at Financial Potion,   so please be honest on your turn around times, confirm once you receive all the assets and let us know if you have questions right away.  Ideally we would like any edit we send to you to be completed within four days of sending you the information.

Thank you!

Hourly Range: $16.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 21:50 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Trailer, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Intro & Outro, Video Commercial, Photo Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Education
Skills: Trailer, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Intro & Outro, Video Commercial, Photo Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Education
Country: United States
click to apply

item.description:

This should take around 30 minutes of work per day. The salary is $200 per month. This is a long-term job, and we can scale this even more, and the budget will also increase. Contact me if you are interested.

item.title: Video Ad Creation and Management - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual to help us create a captivating video ad to be used on IG and Facebook. The ideal candidate will have experience in both video production and digital advertising. Responsibilities will include creating the video asset, optimizing it for maximum engagement, and managing the ad spend for optimal results. This is an exciting opportunity to showcase your creativity and technical skills in a fast-paced digital marketing environment.

Skills required:
- Video production
- Digital advertising
- Creative thinking
- Attention to detail
- Analytical mindset

We are a growing company with a strong online presence, and we are looking for someone who can take our video advertising to the next level. If you are passionate about creating compelling video content and driving results through digital advertising, we would love to hear from you!

item.description:
I have videos that need to be color graded, edited with copyright free music and sound effects. The raw footage is no more than 10 mins and the final video should be at least 2mins and 45 seconds (final). Please:
-Be Creative
-Be Fast
-Know how to speed ramp

I also have sound parameters:
Voice: 0 db or lower
Music: -6 db to -12 db
Sound effects: -10 db to -20 db

item.title: Subtitle for Body Cam Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a entry level video editor who can assist with subtitling body cam video footage.

The job involves synchronizing subtitles and working exclusively with Adobe Premiere Pro. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing, particularly with subtitling and syncing audio and video.  It's a simple jobs we will provided the subtitles script for every video, so you only need to transform it into subtitles.
Attention to detail and accuracy is crucial for this project. Strong communication skills and the ability to work independently and meet deadlines are also necessary.
Here's the example of the YouTube video: https://youtube.com/@thehiddenfiles?si=VdXqyYpbczZIFj6A

If you are passionate about video editing and have the necessary skills, we would love to hear from you! We response every applicants!

Budget: $70
Posted On: June 26, 2024 21:20 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, English, Subtitles
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, English, Subtitles

item.description:
Hello there, amazing Content Creators!😊

We hope you're doing well! We are ContentJet🚀, a UGC Digital Marketing company and we are looking for creator prospects for our client Oaksha!!

-Ages: 19-40

-Beautiful creators

-Product would need to be shipped to them

-Rate: $35 USD per video plus the free product🤩

-You would need to provide your SA and phone number if you are chosen!🏠

-Directions will be provided, but not a full script❗❗

-Website: https://www.oakcha.com/en-ca

Nature of the video: RAW, no editing needed.

Scripts(not full) and Direction will be provided. We will require RAW videos as we edit them ourselves. :)

If you're interested, please, send your UGC portfolio or 2-3 videos of your previous UGC work (talking to the camera) so we can see your camera presence!😍 Also, send the address to which we'll be sending the product!

Looking forward to start collaborating with you!🚀

Thank you!😊
ContentJet.io

Budget: $35

item.title: VIdeo Creative Editor - Design - Content - Graphic - VSL Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Hello! I am looking for an amazing Video Editor who can deliver consistent, reliable work for my marketing firm.

Requirements:
-Proficient English
-Experience creating and editing VSL videos
-Adobe Premiere Pro expert or similar
-Camera or cell phone camera with high resolution (to record any supplemental footage)
-Self-source footage from YouTube to be used as stock footage or supplemental footage / b-roll
-Understanding sales video structure (Hook, Lead, Problem, Solution, Testimonial, Offer)
-Use provided SpyTools to research and find videos that are currently working well for a given vertical or product

Serious inquires only! I am looking to onboard someone full-time ASAP if our interests align and if you perform well.

Thank you!

-Understanding sales video structure (Hook, Lead, Problem, Solution, Testimonial, Offer)
-Use provided SpyTools to research and find videos that are currently working well for a given vertical or product

Serious inquires only! I am looking to onboard someone full-time ASAP if our interests align and if you perform well.

Thank you!



Posted On: June 26, 2024 21:18 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Testimonial Video, Concept Video, Performance Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Proofreading, English
Skills: Testimonial Video, Concept Video, Performance Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Proofreading, English

item.title: Experienced Video Editor for Short and Long Form Content - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced video editor to join our team and assist in creating short and long form content. The ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio showcasing their editing skills and creativity. You will be responsible for editing raw footage into polished videos, adding special effects, visual enhancements, and ensuring the overall quality of the final product. We are very interested in leveraging Ai to help streamline the process so we can create more videos to post online.

    Skills required:
    - Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, Canva or DaVinci Resolve
    - Strong understanding of storytelling and pacing
    - Ability to work with different video formats and codecs
    - Knowledge of color grading and correction techniques
    - Attention to detail and ability to meet tight deadlines

    This is a medium-sized project that will span over 1 to 3 months. The right candidate will have the opportunity to work on a variety of interesting and creative projects.

    Expertise level: Intermediate

    If you have the skills and experience we are looking for, we would love to hear from you. Please include your portfolio or samples of your work when applying for this position.

Hourly Range: $6.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 21:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, English, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, English, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply
